title: U.S.-India trade deal at 'very advanced stage,' Indian petroleum minister tells CNBC
summary: A much-anticipated trade deal between India and the U.S. is at "a very advanced stage," India's oil and natural gas minister told CNBC Tuesday.

title: U.S. Natural Gas Prices Retreat After Rallying 117%
summary: U.S. natural gas prices dipped today amid profit-taking by traders, after soaring by over 117% in the five days to Monday, Bloomberg has reported, noting the benchmark jumped by 30% on Monday alone. Last week, gas prices went up by as much as 70% amid frigid weather that apparently took gas traders…

title: Can the gold rally continue? The CEO of this miner says the fuel for the rally hasn't faded yet
summary: "The fundamentals that have pushed gold up are still there," Agnico Eagle CEO Ammar Al-Joundi told Jim Cramer.

title: Top Traders Begin Venezuela Oil Sales with U.S. Blessing

title: Why 2026 May Mark a Turning Point for the Global Onshore Wind Industry
summary: The global onshore wind sector entered 2026 with overall stability in capacity growth, but beneath the surface, the industry is undergoing a profound shift in priorities. title: The Growing Gap Between Fossil Fuel Use and Finds
summary: Herbert Stein was an American economist who served in both the Nixon and Ford administrations. He is probably most famous for formulating Stein's Law, namely, "If something cannot go on forever, it will stop." This is, of course, an obvious statement.
